resources.string: "The permission is required to measure distances with the camera."
"This app is too old, try updating."
"Something went wrong. Try restarting the measuring."
"Too steep of an angle, step away a bit"
"Keep closer to the arrow but watch out for traffic!"

"

ARCore sometimes (initially) presumes the ground to be a bit lower or higher than it actually is. This introduces a measurement error that gets larger the more you tilt your phone towards the horizon.

Set each the start- and endpoint while pointing the phone straight down (so that you see the white arrow from above) to completely avoid this issue for horizontal measurements.

For vertical measurements, you need to instead check that the startpoint does not seem to move in relation to the ground by looking at it from different directions.

"
"This application runs on Google Play Services for AR (ARCore), which is provided by Google and governed by the Google Privacy Policy."
